levels.description: After deployment, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all surrounding enemies and inflicts <@ba.vup>-{-magic_resistance:0%}</> RES for <@ba.vup>{debuff_duration}</> seconds; ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks hit 2 times and deal Arts damage
